mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( id, pass, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, post_code, addr, recommender ) VALUES( #{id}, #{pass}, #{nick_name}, #{membername}, CONCAT(#{birth1},"년 ",#{birth2},"월 ",#{birth3},"일"), #{gender}, CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3}), #{addr1}, CONCAT(#{addr2}," ",#{addr3}), #{recommender} )
mapper.select: SELECT midx, id, nick_name, membername, birthday, gender, phone, join_date, mileage, grade, del_yn, blacklist_yn, follower_cnt, post_code, addr, profile_system FROM member WHERE midx = #{midx}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET id = #{id}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = CONCAT(#{phone1},"-",#{phone2},"-",#{phone3}), addr = #{addr} WHERE midx = #{midx}
UPDATE member SET id = #{id}, nick_name = #{nick_name}, gender = #{gender}, phone = #{phone}, addr = #{addr}, del_yn = #{del_yn}, del_cause = #{del_cause} WHERE midx = #{midx}
mapper.select: SELECT olidx, title, price, img_system, buying_date, progress, delivery_status, review_registration FROM order_list WHERE midx = #{midx}
